data.englishTranslation: O Allah, there is no ease other than what You make easy. If You please You ease sorrow.
data.transliteration: Allaahumma laa sahla illaa maal ja'altahu sahlan wa Anta taj'alul-hazna idhaa shi'ta sahlan.
data.arabicVerse: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَاَّ مَا جَعَلتَهُ سَهْلاً وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلاً
